Uses of Package
org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common

  • Packages that use org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.runners.direct  
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders
    Defines Coders to specify how data is encoded to and decoded from byte strings.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.runners
    Defines runners for executing Pipelines in different modes, including DirectPipelineRunner and org.apache.beam.sdk.runners.DataflowPipelineRunner.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms
    Defines PTransforms for transforming data in a pipeline.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.join
    Defines the CoGroupByKey transform for joining multiple PCollections.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.util
    Defines utilities used by the Dataflow SDK.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common
    Defines utilities shared by multiple PipelineRunner implementations.
  • Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common used by org.apache.beam.runners.direct 
    Class and Description
    CounterSet
    A CounterSet maintains a set of Counters.
  • Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common used by org.apache.beam.sdk.coders 
    Class and Description
    ElementByteSizeObserver
    An observer that gets notified when additional bytes are read and/or used.
  • Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common used by org.apache.beam.sdk.runners 
    Class and Description
    CounterSet.AddCounterMutator
    A nested class that supports adding additional counters into the enclosing CounterSet.
  • Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common used by org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms 
    Class and Description
    Counter
    A Counter enables the aggregation of a stream of values over time.
    CounterProvider
    A counter provider can provide Counter instances.
  • Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common used by org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.join 
    Class and Description
    ElementByteSizeObserver
    An observer that gets notified when additional bytes are read and/or used.

    A nested class that supports adding additional counters into the enclosing CounterSet.
    ElementByteSizeObserver
    An observer that gets notified when additional bytes are read and/or used.
  • Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common used by org.apache.beam.sdk.util.common 
    Class and Description
    Counter
    A Counter enables the aggregation of a stream of values over time.
    Counter.AggregationKind
    Possible kinds of counter aggregation.
    Counter.CounterMean
    The mean value of a Counter, represented as an aggregate value and a count.
    CounterName
    The name of a counter identifies the user-specified name, as well as the origin, the step the counter is associated with, and a prefix to add to the name.
    CounterSet
    A CounterSet maintains a set of Counters.
    CounterSet.AddCounterMutator
    A nested class that supports adding additional counters into the enclosing CounterSet.
    ElementByteSizeObservableIterator
    An abstract class used for iterators that notify observers about size in bytes of their elements, as they are being iterated over.
    ElementByteSizeObserver
    An observer that gets notified when additional bytes are read and/or used.
    PeekingReiterator
    A Reiterator that supports one-element lookahead during iteration.
    Reiterator
    An Iterator with the ability to copy its iteration state.
